attributes.action: Reverse the new road layout at the Aldgate City of London junction.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Who decided that this was a good idea.  I would like to know if the public was consulted and if so why did it come as such a surprise to everybody.  It was bad enough before but now its a total nightmare.  I can't see how this is an improvement and also can't see it getting any better.
